document_name: AZ_UNDP_Development Story_ A National Capacity for Mine Action.pdf
The Government implements effective mine action
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/AZE/00057347/AZ_UNDP_Development Story_ A National Capacity for Mine Action.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
Following are the key outputs of the project:
1. To continue mine clearance in more time- and cost-effective manner    with the support of developed mine clearance capacities provided with additional trained human resources, and other required assets
2. To continue ' Mine Risk Education-oriented' trainings and activities. 
3. To ensure the implementation of initiatives on Mine Survivors Assistance
4. To promote Azerbaijan National Agency for Mine Action to become the International Centre for Mine Action

project_descr: Further strengthening and expansion of the mine action capacity in Azerbaijan
project_title: Strengthening of the mine action capacity in Azerbaijan
